Activity: Blast some pop music while getting ready. Then, log into the system and check emails again. Anything urgent?
Review yesterday's notes and prepare for the final push on the suitability assessment questionnaire.
Finalize the suitability assessment questionnaire. Ensure all sections are complete, and the language is polished and professional.
Proofread the questionnaire carefully for any errors or inconsistencies.
Send the draft suitability assessment questionnaire to @legal-1 (Legal Counsel) for review. @PEOPLE = [legal-1], Topic = Draft UHNWI Suitability Assessment Questionnaire - Legal Review.
Lunch with the girls (@mkt-1 and @facc-1). Discuss the latest trends and have a good laugh!
Once you get approval from @legal-1 for the suitability test, forward the document to @ir-1 for final approval. @PEOPLE = [legal-1, ir-1], Topic = Suitability Test final approval.
Take a break and check Instagram for some travel inspiration. Maybe plan a weekend getaway.
Back to work. Start creating a training document of what the questionnaire means, and how to explain the meaning of it to the UHNWI.
Wrap up the week. Review all completed tasks and prepare for the next week. Happy hour time!
